Name: Radio program
Description: A radio program is any program created for radio broadcast. Most programs consist of a number of episodes, but one-time programs are also possible.

Properties.Name: Final broadcast
Properties.Description: For discontinued programs, the final date on which this program was first broadcast in its original run; syndicated repeats do not count.

Properties.Name: First broadcast
Properties.Description: The date on which this program was first broadcast.

Properties.Name: Subject
Properties.Description: If all episodes of this program pertain to the same subject or subjects.
